creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: grayish-white stoneware bowl with slightly flaring lip; short foot; reddish-brown glaze in places around lip; streaks of white down outside; tiny pockmarks
medium: Shino ware; White stoneware with touches of underglaze iron on rim
text: This bowl was made at the Suigetsugama 水月窯 kiln in Tajimi which was founded in 1946 by the famous potter Arakawa Toyozō.
title: Shino glazed bowl
